title: Malian immigrant rescues boy from Paris balcony
text:
Malian immigrant rescues boy from Paris balcony 3:30pm EDT - 00:40
Video shows Mamoudou Gassama, a 22-year-old illegal immigrant from Mali, risking his life on Sunday as he climbed up the balconies of a Paris apartment building to rescue the four-year-old who is clinging to a railing and glancing at the ground below, while horrified onlookers watched. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
